tachyon.master

Interface Master

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JournalCheckpointStreamable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockMaster, FileSystemMaster, LineageMaster, MasterBase, RawTableMaster

    public interface Master
extends JournalCheckpointStreamable

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.thrift.TProcessor getProcessor() 
      String getServiceName() 
      void processJournalCheckpoint(JournalInputStream inputStream)
      Processes the journal checkpoint file and applies the entries to the master.
      void processJournalEntry(JournalEntry entry)
      Processes a journal entry and applies it to the master.
      void start(boolean isLeader)
      Starts the master, as the leader master or the standby master.
      void stop()
      Stops the master.
      void upgradeToReadWriteJournal(ReadWriteJournal journal)

      • Methods inherited from interface tachyon.master.journal.JournalCheckpointStreamable

        streamToJournalCheckpoint

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessor

        org.apache.thrift.TProcessor getProcessor()
        Returns:
        the TProcessor serving RPC service for this master

      • getServiceName

        String getServiceName()
        Returns:
        a String representing this master service name

      • processJournalCheckpoint

        void processJournalCheckpoint(JournalInputStream inputStream)
                              throws IOException
        Processes the journal checkpoint file and applies the entries to the master.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the input stream for the journal checkpoint file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • processJournalEntry

        void processJournalEntry(JournalEntry entry)
                         throws IOException
        Processes a journal entry and applies it to the master. These entries follow the checkpoint entries.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to process to update the state of the master.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • start

        void start(boolean isLeader)
           throws IOException
        Starts the master, as the leader master or the standby master. Here, the master should initialize state and possibly start threads required for operation. If isLeader is true, the master should also initialize the journal and write the checkpoint file.
        Parameters:
        isLeader - if true, the master should behave as the leader master in the system. If false, the master should act as a standby master.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • stop

        void stop()
          throws IOException
        Stops the master. Here, anything created or started in start(boolean) should be cleaned up and shutdown.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • upgradeToReadWriteJournal

        void upgradeToReadWriteJournal(ReadWriteJournal journal)
        Provides the master with a ReadWriteJournal capable of writing, in preparation to starting as the leader. This enables transitioning from standby master to leader master without having to construct a new master object.
        Parameters:
        journal - the ReadWriteJournal capable of writing
